resources.string: G-Box Q info
When you allow data roaming, you may incur significant roaming charges!\n\nThis setting affects all users on this G-Box Q.
Encrypt G-Box Q
Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your G-Box Q each time you power it on

You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your G-Box Q, you need to type a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on. You can\'t decrypt your G-Box Q except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.\n\nEncryption takes an hour or more. You must keep your G-Box Q plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data.
Encrypt G-Box Q
The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you\'ll lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the G-Box Q will restart several times.

Encryption was interrupted and can\'t complete. As a result, the data on your G-Box Q is no longer accessible. \n\n To resume using your G-Box Q, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your G-Box Q after the reset, you\'ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account.
Allow data exchange when the G-Box Q touches another device
To complete setup, your G-Box Q needs access to Wi-Fi. After setup, you can switch between mobile data and Wi-Fi.
WARNING: You may incur extra carrier data charges.\n\nG-Box Q setup can require significant network activity.
WARNING: The G-Box Q won\'t be able to verify that your software is up to date.
The G-Box Q was unable to connect to this Wi-Fi network.
G-Box Q not docked
You need to dock the G-Box Q before setting up dock audio.
Play sound when inserting or removing G-Box Q from dock
Switch orientation automatically when rotating G-Box Q
Switch orientation automatically when rotating G-Box Q
G-Box Q status
Erases all data on G-Box Q

"This will erase all data from your G-Box Q's internal storage, including:


Your Google account

System and app data and settings

Downloaded apps"
Reset G-Box Q
Let apps use GPS on your G-Box Q to pinpoint your location
About G-Box Q

Your G-Box MX2 and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your G-Box Q or loss of data that may result from using these apps.
This app can access the following on your G-Box Q:
Move to G-Box Q
If you stop this service, some features of your G-Box Q may stop working correctly until you power it off and then on again.
G-Box Q information
G-Box Q idle
G-Box Q
Reset G-Box Q
Removing this account will delete all of its messages, contacts, and other data from the G-Box Q!
This account is required by some apps. You can only remove it by resetting the G-Box Q to factory defaults (which deletes all your personal data) in Settings > Backup & reset.

Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your G-Box Q.

Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the G-Box Q to the web. A Google Account works this way.

To choose which kinds of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
This user\'s space and data will disappear from this G-Box Q. You can\'t undo this action.
This setting affects all users on this G-Box Q.
